title: Windows 8.1 AIO x86 x64 [EN] [June.2015-NiKKA]
description:
NiKKA p r e s e n t s :    
                   
Windows.8.1.AIO.EN.x86.x64.June.2015-NiKKA
Version x86 - 32bit & x64 - 64bit in one installer (AIO) - 10 systems to choice

32bit - Core, Pro, Pro Media Center, Pro VL, Enterprise
64bit - Core, Pro, Pro Media Center, Pro VL, Enterprise

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:

Info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_8.1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Info:

Source: Latest M$ versions Win8.1 Update 3 (2014.12)

Type: System, x64 - 64bit
Language: English
Volume: 1xDVD9, bootable ISO, bootable USB
Create Date: 2015.07.11
Release Date: 2015.07.12
By: NiKKA            


Contents:

- Integrated updates up to 2015.06
- Integrated NET 3.5 (contains NET 2.0 i 3.0)
- Updated DirectX (setupcomplete.cmd)
- NET 4.5.2 - install on WU or see in EXTRAS folder
- Versions 32bit to install: Core, Pro, Pro Media Center,
  Pro VL, Enterprise
- Versions 64bit to install: Core, Pro, Pro Media Center,
  Pro VL, Enterprise
- You can install with your original key


Instruction:

Size ISO: 5,74 GB (bajtÃƒÂ³w: 6Ã‚Â 169Ã‚Â 110Ã‚Â 528)
SHA1 ISO: 4f18a2016446bfc9ee6bc5df85ecd330bda0d8fc

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD9/DL) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootble USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=ntfs quick 
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activate - read info in activation.txt or activation_VL.txt

WARNING!
If you have RETAIL key, copy/paste EI.CFG from ISO_RETAIL to /ISO/sources or edit ISO: in /ISO/sources/EI.CFG change OEM to Retail

In EXTRAS folder:
- DirectX v9.29.1974 (as you need to reinstall)
- NET Framework 4.5.2 32bit_64bit EN Win8.1 (2015.06) or WU
- Clean WinSxS
- setupcomplete - read info

Install.esd
Install.wim file was exported (highly compressed) to install.esd (/compress:recovery)

Win10 compatibility check/telemetry (not integrated, your decision):
- KB3035583
- KB2976978
- KB3044374
- KB3068708
- KB3050267
- KB3058168
- KB3065988
These, and other, newer, new - will be on Windows Update.

How hide unwanted updates: <a href="
http://www.turboimagehost.com/p/23391150/Win8.1_EN_64bit_2015.06_result_how_hide.png.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.turboimagehost.com/p/23391150/Win8.1_EN_64bit_2015.06_result_how_hide.png.html</a>

AIO:
AIO version does not support UEFI Boot.
Recovery mode is x86 - 32bit (32bit must be in AIO). If you want to install in UEFI mode, download a separate version of x64 - 64bit.

P.S. Do not remove the USB/DVD during the installation until it is fully installed - get a working desktop.


System settings unchanged. Integrated via Slipstream. Mastering via scripts (DISM, IMAGEX, OSCDIMG, CMD)
